00023 #include <stdio.h>
00024 #include <avr/io.h>
00025 #include <avr/interrupt.h>
00026 
00028 #define OCR0_1MS        14
00029 
00035 void init_timer_0(void)
00036 {
00037    TCCR0 = 0;
00038    TIMSK |= (1<<OCIE0);         /* enable output compare interrupt */
00039    TCCR0  = (1<<WGM01)|(1<<CS02)|(0<<CS01)|(1<<CS00); /* CTC, prescale = 1024 */
00040    TCNT0  = 0;
00041    OCR0   = OCR0_1MS;                     /* match in aprox 1 ms,  */
00042 }
00043 
00045 void init_timer_2(void)
00046 {
00047         TCCR2 = 0;
00048         TCNT2 = 0;
00049         TCCR2 = (1<<WGM21) | (0<<WGM20) | (0<<CS22) | (1<<CS21) | (1<<CS20); //Normal operation, toggle on compare, prescale clk/64     
00050         TIFR |= (1<<OCF2);
00051         OCR2 = 58;      //Will trigger an interrupt each with an interval of 130us
00052         TIMSK |= (1<<OCIE2);
00053 }
00054 
00056 void init_ports(void)
00057 {
00058         DDRA = 0xFF;
00059         DDRB = 0x0F;
00060         DDRC = 0xFC;
00061         DDRD = 0x0E;
00062         
00063         //Pull up the PORTD
00064         PORTD |= (1<<1);
00065 }
